lead_paragraph: Moscow regional prosecutors said an ice arena manager and a hockey club director were negligent in the death of the rising Russian star Alexei Cherepanov. Prosecutors said in a statement posted on their Web site that the manager of the Moscow region arena where Cherepanov was playing failed to coordinate proper emergency medical services before the game.
